about_the_game:
The Definitive Horror Escape Game "THE JUSOU"

The "THE JUSOU series", renowned as the most terrifying horror escape game in the history of smartphones, is now available on Steam!

Many players have abandoned their games due to the sheer terror it instills! The chilling horror, deemed to be beyond belief, is taking over Twitter feeds and live streams!

It's too terrifying to play alone! If you find yourself unable to play it alone, invite your friends, loved ones, or family members to join the scare-fest!

Promising the most horrifying production ever, we guarantee to deliver chills and thrills that will remain etched in your memory.

*This game contains grotesque depictions, such as horrifying scenes and blood, which may induce trauma.
*Please play at your own risk if you experience any unusual phenomena after playing this game.

Your love for horror games is about to be taken to the next level.

■■Prologue■■

I am standing in front of an old house. I passed this certain house everyday on my way home.

Ten years ago, a family with a child stayed here for a while. After they moved out though, nobody has since lived there.

Maybe it`s just my imagination, but... I think i saw somebody inside the house recently.

It makes me curious...

So, as if possessed, I pass the gate and walk to the front of the house.

■■■■

Fear is contagious…
